summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1205, for the improvement of East Spring Street, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue; Twenty-sixth Avenue, from the South line of Buckius' Addition to the City of Seattle to East Union Street; Twenty-seventh Avenue, from the South line of Buckius' Addition to the City of Seattle to East Union Street; Twenty-eighth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Union Street, and Twenty-ninth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Union Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 13301 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
